A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great popcorn flick. Forget JJ Abrams\, Disney should just hire Michael Bay to end out the trilogy. If you actually want to see a plot\, go see the reimagined Battlestar Galactica's (BSG) episode \"33\". It has the same basic plot of this movie\, but is much better written. This is basically because \"the rebels\" forgot their plutonium back in 1985.
